contact.description: The contact which has the work history.

org.description: The org that this work history orgname refers to.

orgname.description: The reported name of the org the contact worked for.

orgfqdn.description: The reported fqdn of the org the contact worked for.

started.description: The date that the contact began working.

ended.description: The date that the contact stopped working.

duration.description: The duration of the period of work.

pay.description: The estimated/average yearly pay for the work.

currency.description: The currency that the yearly pay was delivered in.
